menu.confirmLogout: Are you sure you want to log out?

login.title: Log In
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials
login.descriptionLoginError: There was an error logging in. Please check your credentials and try again.
login.descriptionRecoveryPassword: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your social networks and preferences.
settings.socialNetworksDescription: Connect your accounts and share your projects.
settings.notFoundPages: No pages found. If you manage a LinkedIn page, it will appear here.
settings.disconnectLinkedIn: Do you want to disconnect your LinkedIn account?
settings.disconnectLinkedInDescription: Once disconnected, you will no longer be able to publish on LinkedIn.
settings.disconnectInstagram: Do you want to disconnect your Instagram account?
settings.disconnectInstagramDescription: Once disconnected, you will no longer be able to publish on Instagram.
settings.notFoundInstagramPages: No Instagram pages found. If you manage an Instagram page, it will appear here.
settings.instagramDescription: To publish on Instagram, you must connect your Facebook account and have a business page.

publications.title: Publications
publications.description: Manage your publications and review history.
publications.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this publication?

maps.title: Project Map
maps.subtitle: Explore projects on the map. Click markers to see more details.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Create and edit your projects. When ready, launch the publications.
projects.launchDescription: Your project will be launched to generate a preview. It will be available in Publications shortly.
projects.recoveryTitle: Do you want to recover this project?
projects.recoveryDescription: The project will be restored as a draft.
projects.requiredAI: Do you want to use AI for this project? Check yes to activate
projects.howManyPublications: How many publications do you want to create?
projects.maxSizeAllowed: The maximum allowed size per image is
projects.maxImagesError: The maximum number of images is
projects.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This action cannot be undone.

previewProjects.title: Project Preview
previewProjects.configureDescription: Select the date and the social network to publish on.
previewProjects.deleteProject: Do you want to delete the project?
previewProjects.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This action cannot be undone.
previewProjects.messagePublished: The project has already been published or is being published
previewProjects.messagePrepublish: You can edit publication data until the day before the scheduled date
previewProjects.messageFutureDate: The publication date cannot be earlier than today
previewProjects.messageCurrentDate: If you select today's date, your project will be published immediately
previewProjects.publishAgainDescription: Do you want to republish this project? It will be published again on the selected social networks.

profile.title: Profile
profile.titleChangePassword: Do you want to change your password?
profile.descriptionChangePassword: Please enter and confirm your new password
